title: Joe Biden Forgives Student Debt, Frozen Pizza Taste Test - Leftovers #23
description: Today, our resident pizza sommelier Ethan Klein tries to teach Hasan how to improve his frozen pizza palette. We also discuss Joe Brandon's loan forgiveness program, Ron DeSantis' cringey Top Gun ad, & much more!
